doc:
Peter Hayes (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Hayes_(actor) 0 Peter Hayes (born Melbourne, 28 September 1957) is a Sydney based, British trained, Australian television, film and theatre actor and director. He is perhaps best known for the role of Steven Ryan in the long running Australian soap opera, Prisoner. Peter_Hayes ( born_Melbourne , 28_September_1957 ) is a_Sydney based , British_trained_,_Australian_television_,_film_and_theatre_actor_and_director . He is_perhaps_best_known for the_role of Steven_Ryan in the_long running Australian_soap_opera , Prisoner .
